General.Name: Scimee Sci &Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Cscec Scimee Sci.&Tech. Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells environmental protection equipment and services in China. It offers magnetic separation products, such as magnetic separation water purification equipment and rare earth disk separation and purification wastewater equipment; magnetic precipitation products, including magnetic media coagulation sedimentation structure process package and integrated equipment; and magnetic biochemical products, such as magnetic media bioreactors, micro-oxygen rapid clarification bioreactors, and non-clogging biological aerated filters. The company also provides internal inflow non-metallic orifice grill; sludge drying products, such as waste heat and heat pump low temperature drying equipment; cyclone and removal process, and cyclone velocity separation equipment; and pull bag centrifuge. The company was formerly known as Scimee Sci.&Tech. Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Cscec Scimee Sci.&Tech. Co.,Ltd in October 2019. It operates in municipal sewage treatment, river basin water treatment and industrial wastewater treatment business fields. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Chengdu, China.
